name: Air Combat Arena - Free Client
description:
PROMOTION!!!

Now you can get full game for just $0.11 OR LESS on  http://h2obundle.com

Air Combat Arena is an arcade-style flight combat game. In the game you can pilot various planes play against other players on various maps.

  • Support singleplayer (play against bots) & multiplayer
  • Cross-platform multiplayer game play (PC & Mac)
  • Free for all & Teamed battle modes
  • Cartoon style graphics very suitable for family play

This package is a free client of the full game. The full game can be purchased on following platforms

  • Mac App Store 
  • Valve Steam
